Scattershot/Nemesis Enforcer:


Scattershot and Nemesis Enforcer entered the lab.  


Slamming DeathStorm down against a wall, he took out his energy blade.  
Slicing his chest open piece by piece (I have permission to do this from 
Yanshosh), he ripped out DeathStorm's spark, it trying to get away quickly.  
"Set up a detainment field that allows things to go in, and pull out, but 
nothing gets out." Nemesis ordered.

Scattershot complied.  Nemesis put the spark in the field, going to beast 
mode and leaving the room, to let intern TO ME!"al repairs take care of his 
light wounds.

---

Scatershot chuckled, taking out his sword.  He sliced off DeathStorm's body's 
head.  Cutting the neck open, he put DeathStrorm's head on like a hat, which 
was a snug fit.  "Yeess...I have his powers now!" Scattershot chuckled madly, 
running for his quarters wearing his new hat.
